ForearmsLVGrip.name: Lever Grip
ForearmsLVGrip.preparation: Sit on seat. Grasp lever handles on each side fingers around lever handles and base of thumbs around stationary bars.
ForearmsLVGrip.execution: Squeeze bars together with both hands until lever makes contact with stationary bars. Lower to original position and repeat.
ForearmsLVGrip.comments: Also see muscles for finger articulations and thumb articulations. See lever grip up close.

ForearmsLVUlnarFlexion.name: Lever Ulnar Deviation
ForearmsLVUlnarFlexion.preparation: Rotate handle over and under so handle is in slightly downward position toward thighs. Grasp handle with thumb ups grip so fist is pulled up under resistance.
ForearmsLVUlnarFlexion.execution: Bend wrist so pinky side of fist is pulled down. Return to starting position and repeat.

ForearmsLVWristCurl.name: Lever Wrist Curl
ForearmsLVWristCurl.preparation: Grasp bar with underhand grip to each side. Place forearms on arm pads.
ForearmsLVWristCurl.execution: Raise handles up until wrist is fully flexed. Lower handles until wrists are full hyperextended. Repeat.
ForearmsLVWristCurl.comments: Keep forearms horizontal, flat on arm pads throughout exercise. See wrist curl up close.

ForearmsLVRollerWristFlexion.name: Lever Roller Wrist Flexion
ForearmsLVRollerWristFlexion.preparation: Grasp wrist roller handles with both hands over hand grip.
ForearmsLVRollerWristFlexion.execution: With left hand gripping handle, relax grip of right hand and slide grip behind handle (by hypexending wrist) and regrip. Relax grip of left hand and flex right wrist. Repeat sequence with opposite hands, alternating back and forth until weight plate has raised up near hands. Lower weight steadily with opposite movement or loosen grip slightly to control descent of weight stack. Repeat.
ForearmsLVRollerWristFlexion.comments: Also see Lever Roller Wrist Extension.

ForearmsLVRollerUlnarFlexion.name: Lever Roller Ulnar Deviation
ForearmsLVRollerUlnarFlexion.preparation: Place hands on knobs at each end of roller.
ForearmsLVRollerUlnarFlexion.execution: With left hand gripping knob, relax grip of right hand and slide grip upward so fingers are more over knob (by radial deviation) and regrip. Relax grip of left hand and rotate knob with right hand so thumb travels away from body (by ulnar deviation). Repeat sequence with opposite hands, alternating back and forth until weight plate has raised up near hands. Lower weight steadily with opposite movement or loosen grip slightly to control descent of weight stack.
ForearmsLVRollerUlnarFlexion.comments: Exercise is performed on specialized piece of equipment which includes knobs at each end of wrist roller.
